snippet: A lawyer for one person on that list of so-called unindicted co-conspirators asked a judge to block the release to protect that person’s reputation.
abstract: Federal Judge Susan Wigenton temporarily delays release of list of names of people suspected to have been involved in 2013 lane closings on George Washington Bridge but not charged; request to block release of list, which came from unidentified person named in document, has already been denied by Wigenton.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for one person on that list of so-called unindicted co-conspirators asked a judge to block the release to protect that person’s reputation.

headline.main: Release of Names Linked to George Washington Bridge Scandal Is Delayed
headline.print_headline: Release of Names Linked  to Bridge Case Is Delayed

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
